RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList

RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList Class Reference

#include <playerlist.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The fltk playerlist panel.

It creates a panel to work on players in fltk environment. It shows a player's name list that can be selected.

The player list if none player is selected

If we select a player

Definition at line 66 of file playerlist.h.

Definition at line 110 of file playerlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::i_cbAddPlayer (  )  [inline, private]

The inline callback for the add player button.

It instanciates the AddPlayer class if it is equal to NULL. If it already exists, it simply shows it and call roll() again.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::loadPlayerList (  )  [private]

Load the player list and feed the player's name list.

It uses xmlPlayerList to get the player list. After a call to this method, the pl tPlayerList pointer should contains the player list.

Definition at line 135 of file playerlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::showPlayer ( tPlayerListItem *  i  )  [private]

Feed the fltk display widgets with the player's information.

The player passed in parameter will be used to feed the form.

Parameters:
i The player to show.

Definition at line 202 of file playerlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerList::showNonePlayer (  )  [private]

Feed the form with empty values.

Reset the fltk widgets as if no player was shown.
